brandColors.description: Bold, modern, tech-forward palette with LA sunset vibes

educational.visualStyle: Clean infographic style with bold text, modern layouts, easy-to-digest visual hierarchy
educational.example: Think: YouTube thumbnail meets modern startup - bold, clear, makes you want to learn

hypotheticalCaseStudy.visualStyle: Real business scenarios, relatable small business settings (LA storefronts, salons, apartments)
hypotheticalCaseStudy.example: Show actual small businesses using AI - nail salon, corner store, apartment building with tech overlay

toolReview.visualStyle: Split screen comparisons, product interfaces, honest comparison charts
toolReview.example: Clear product comparison - no BS, just facts. Think Consumer Reports but make it Instagram

industryInsight.visualStyle: Bold statements, data visualization, trend graphics, futuristic but accessible
industryInsight.example: Tech trend content with attitude - think tech news but from the streets, not boardroom

quickWin.visualStyle: Punchy, attention-grabbing, single clear message, minimal design
quickWin.colorPalette: high contrast - accent colors on dark or light
quickWin.example: Stop-scrolling energy - one message, impossible to miss, makes you act NOW

businessSettings: Modern nail salon in Inglewood with tech touches
LA corner store with digital screens

carousel.layout: Bold title at top, clear visual in center, readable from thumbnail
carousel.textSpace: Leave 30% of image for text overlay

reel.layout: Vertical 9:16, safe zones for UI elements
reel.motion: Smooth, professional movement - no dizzying effects
reel.text: Minimal text, let visuals tell story

qualityStandards.lighting: Professional but not studio-fake, natural LA light when possible
qualityStandards.authenticity: Real scenarios over stock photos, actual tech over fake interfaces
qualityStandards.diversity: Authentic LA diversity - Black, Latino, Asian, mixed communities
qualityStandards.accessibility: High contrast text, readable fonts, clear messaging

examplePrompts.educational: Create a bold, modern infographic about [TOPIC] with clean typography and LA urban aesthetic. Style: YouTube thumbnail meets startup culture - professional but approachable. Use deep purple and electric blue color scheme with bright yellow accents. Include step-by-step visual elements, icons, and clear hierarchy. Leave space for text overlay. Make it look like it's from a South LA tech educator who keeps it real. 4K, Instagram-optimized, highly shareable.
examplePrompts.caseStudy: Create a realistic scene showing [SCENARIO] in an Inglewood/South LA setting. Show actual small business environment (nail salon/restaurant/apartment building) with modern AI technology integrated naturally. Include real working professionals using tech, not stock photo fake. Warm, natural LA lighting. Tech overlay showing results/data. Urban LA aesthetic, authentic diversity. Professional but relatable. 4K quality.
examplePrompts.toolReview: Create a clean comparison visual for [TOOL1] vs [TOOL2]. Split screen design with app interfaces, side-by-side features, honest pros/cons. Modern tech aesthetic with neutral grays and bright accent colors for highlights. Clear typography, easy to read at glance. No BS corporate marketing - show real functionality. Instagram square format, bold and clear.
examplePrompts.insight: Create a bold statement visual about [TREND]. Large impactful typography with data visualization elements. Futuristic but accessible tech aesthetic. LA urban background or abstract tech environment. Deep purple/electric blue gradient with bright accents. Forward-thinking mood - street smart meets tech expert. Confident, attention-grabbing, makes you stop and read.
examplePrompts.quickWin: Create high-impact minimalist design with message '[MESSAGE]'. Single focal point, bold typography, impossible to miss. High contrast - bright accent color on dark background or vice versa. Urgent, actionable energy. Zero clutter. Street sign meets tech ad. Stop-scrolling power. Perfect for Instagram stories.
